data.title: Rokudo’s Bad Girls Reveals New Key Visual, Premieres April 7
data.meta_description: The production team for Rokudo's Bad Girls has revealed a new key visual, featuring many of the series’ main characters.
data.meta_site_name: Anime Trending | Your Voice in Anime!
data.text:
The production team for Rokudo’s Bad Girls has revealed a new second key visual, featuring many of the series’ main characters. The anime series will premiere on April 7, 2023.

The main production staff for the anime includes Keiya Saitou (Kirarin Revolution episode director) as director, Yuuichirou Momose (Lucifer and the Biscuit Hammer) as series screenwriter, Shinya Segawa (Garakowa: Restore the World) as character designer, Shuumei Oonishi (Pet animation director) as sub-character designer, Yoshimi Kawakami (Fairy Tail 2018) as color designer, Inaho’s Yuujirou Yamane (If It’s for My Daughter, I’d Even Defeat a Demon Lord) as compositing director, and Mukuo Studio’s Kenichi Tajiri (Build Divide) as art director. Satelight is handling the animation production for the series.

New voice cast members for the show have also been announced. It includes Mayuko Kazama as Yui Yashiya, Yuri Komagata as Erika Otohime, Hiroki Nanami as Aoi Furukawa, and Daiki Yamashita as Dоuji Matsugamiya. Reina Ueda will voice three roles as the Sumire triplets: Raino, Kazeno, and Amano.

Meanwhile, the main voice cast includes Gen Satou as Tosuke Rokudo, Sumire Uesaka as Ranna Himawari, Naomi Oozora as Sayuri Osanada, Yuki Yomichi as Azami Himeno, Misato Matsuoka as Tsubaki, Hitomi Sekine as Mizue Tsuyukusa, and Haruki Ishiya as Haruya Iinuma. Additional cast members include Daisuke Namikawa as Hinomoto “Major” Masaru and Akira Ishida as Kijima “Section Chief” Kota.

The series is based on the original manga by Yuuji Nakamura, which ran in Akita Shoten’s Weekly Shonen Champion magazine from June 23, 2016 to April 8, 2021. The manga is published under the Shonen Champion Comics label and has released 26 total tankoubon volumes.

Crunchyroll will stream Rokudo’s Bad Girls worldwide, except in Asia. It describes the story as:

Tousuke Rokudo, a first-year student at Amori High, a school attended mostly by delinquents, wants to live a peaceful life with his friends. However, this seems to be impossible because of the fact that he is constantly bullied by his delinquent classmates. When Rokudo and his friends become desperate, Rokudo receives a mysterious package from his long-deceased grandfather. Inside lies a priest’s uniform and a mysterious scroll passed down through his family since the Heian period, said to hold a technique that wards off demons and evil spirits.
